nsgl.real.random

Class LocationScale

  • java.lang.Object
    • nsgl.real.random.LocationScale
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UsesRawGenerator, Random
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Gaussian, PowerLaw, Uniform

    public abstract class LocationScale
extends java.lang.Object
implements UsesRawGenerator, Random

    Title: LocationScale.

    Description: An abstract random distribution that can be located and scaled.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LocationScale()
      Creates a standard location-scale distribution (shift-value miu=0 and scale factor sigma=1.0)
      LocationScale(double miu)
      Creates a location-scale distribution whit scale factor sigma=1.0 and the given shift-value miu
      LocationScale(double miu, double sigma)
      Creates a location-scale distribution whit the given shift-value miu and scale factor sigma

      Generates random number following the standard distribution, i.e.
